Name: Magic Staves
About the game: Protect the magic crystal that gives the power to your magic! Waves of enemies will attack the source of your power, but you must hold them back with magical staves that will attack the enemies. These staves can be upgraded over time to deal more damage. Also use magic that deals damage to the enemy. Place your defensive staves wisely, as some of the staves can slow down the enemy, while others deal damage from a distance. Magic Staves - 2D strategy in the Tower Defense genre, the main task of which is to resist the onslaught of countless monsters of the powers of darkness. Place various defensive structures along the perimeter of the attack line and spend resources on construction wisely, because your success depends on it! -Pixel graphics -Improvements -Lots of enemies -Abilities
